jam.sort
Class VME_Map

java.lang.Object
  jam.sort.VME_Map
public class VME_Map
extends java.lang.Object

Class for containing a map of the ADC and TDC modules to be addressed, along with channels and thresholds.

Method Detail

eventParameter

public int eventParameter(int slot,
                          int baseAddress,
                          int channel,
                          int threshold)
                   throws SortException
Creates and adds an event parameter to the list of event parameters. V785 ADC's can have base addresses from 0x20000000-0x2FFF0000. V775 TDC's can have base addresses from 0x30000000-0x3FFF0000.

Parameters:
slot - slot in which the unit resides in the VME bus
baseAddress - 24-bit base address of ADC or TDC module ()
channel - integer from 0 to 31 indicating channel in ADC or TDC
threshold - integer from 0 to 4095 indicating lower threshold for recording the value
Returns:
index in event array passed to Sorter containing this parameter's data
Throws:
SortException

setV775Range

public void setV775Range(int baseAddress,
                         int range)
                  throws SortException
Called in a sort routine to set the range of a V775 TDC in nanoseconds.

Parameters:
baseAddress - must be 0x3???0000
range - range in ns, between 141 and 1200
Throws:
SortException

getV775Ranges
